title: Workshop on Designing Technology-Enhanced Strategies for Teacher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service and in-service secondary school language teachers. Operated with formative assessments using SQD evaluation tools in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: The SQD assessment tool can be used to analyze case studies applying six technology-enhanced teaching methods (role modeling, reflection, collaboration, feedback, lesson design, and authentic experiences).
Effective teacher training strategies can be designed and implemented using smartphones in resource-constrained technological environments.
Through peer and self-assessment, strategies for improving teaching methods can be derived, and actionable plans can be developed.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
